description: The sign outside this restaurant in the centre of the typical village of Céres bears the words “Ristourànt Valàdess at Lanss con Oubèrgi”. Enjoy regional cuisine with a personalised twist, with local products from the valley featuring in many of the specialities served here, all accompanied by a good selection of regional, Italian and international wines. Outdoor dining area available in summer.
